title: Verify AuthPage Loads Successfully
description: Check that the authentication page loads without errors and all UI elements are visible.

steps.description: Navigate to the /auth page on http://localhost:5173
Verify that the authentication form is displayed
Verify that username and password input fields are visible
Verify that the login button is visible and enabled

title: Successful Operator Login with Valid Credentials
description: Verify that an operator can successfully log in using valid username and password.

steps.description: Navigate to the /auth page on http://localhost:5173
Enter valid operator username in username field
Enter valid operator password in password field
Click the login button
Verify that login is successful and user is redirected from /auth

title: Unsuccessful Login with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify that login fails when an invalid username or password is provided, and appropriate error message is displayed.

steps.description: Navigate to the /auth page on http://localhost:5173
Enter invalid username in username field
Enter invalid password in password field
Click the login button
Verify that an error message is displayed indicating invalid credentials
Verify that user remains on the /auth page

title: Verify UI Elements Accessibility and Focus Order
description: Ensure that all UI elements in the AuthPage are accessible via keyboard navigation in a logical order.

steps.description: Navigate to the /auth page on http://localhost:5173
Use tab key to navigate through the form elements
Verify that the focus moves in logical order: username field, password field, login button
Verify that each control is accessible and interactive via keyboard

title: Verify Empty Username and Password Validation
description: Ensure that login fails when username or password is empty and appropriate validation error messages are shown.

steps.description: Navigate to the /auth page on http://localhost:5173
Leave username field empty and enter valid password
Click the login button
Verify validation error message for empty username is displayed
Enter valid username and leave password field empty
Click the login button
Verify validation error message for empty password is displayed

title: Capture Screenshot on Login Failure
description: Verify that a screenshot is captured and saved when login fails due to invalid credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the /auth page on http://localhost:5173
Enter invalid credentials
Click the login button
Verify that a screenshot is automatically captured and saved on login failure

title: Verify Login Button Disabled Until Input Fields Are Filled
description: Ensure that the login button remains disabled until both username and password fields have input.

steps.description: Navigate to the /auth page on http://localhost:5174
Verify login button is disabled when both fields are empty
Enter only username
Verify login button remains disabled
Enter only password and clear username
Verify login button remains disabled
Enter both username and password
Verify login button is enabled
